entries.title: What is Freeform, and why should it be your next creative brainstorming tool?
entries.description: Apple has added a new brainstorming tool to MacOS, iOS, and iPadOS. It's ready to empower you with a flexible canvas to see, share, and collaborate on ideas.

entries.title: 'More powerful than ChatGPT': Microsoft unveils new AI-improved Bing and Edge browser
entries.description: Microsoft has tapped OpenAI, the maker of ChatGPT, to help it improve its Bing search engine, while also improving its web browser

entries.title: How to easily transfer files from Android to MacOS
entries.description: If you're a cross-platform user, you might need to move files back and forth between Android and MacOS. Here's one way of doing it.

entries.title: The only practice amp you'll ever need: Fender Mustang LT25
entries.description: The Fender Mustang LT25 is the ultimate practice amp, with 60 preset and custom channels and USB connectivity for recording on your PC. You can play everything from acoustic ballads and classic rock to modern metal and punk without an elaborate (and expensive) pedal board.

entries.title: Why the Fender Mustang LT25 is the best cheap amp for me
entries.description: The Fender Mustang LT25 offers 60 preset and custom channels and USB connectivity for recording on your PC -- no elaborate (and expensive) pedal board required.

entries.title: HP LaserJet Pro MFP review: A multifunction laser printer you won't hate
entries.description: With fast, clear output of professional-quality documents, and integrated scan, copy, and fax capabilities, this SMB laser printer can do it all. The best part? Setup and software aren't horrible.

entries.title: 14 big technology and innovation ideas with super-exponential growth futures
entries.description: The market value of five disruptive innovation platforms could scale 40% at an annual rate during this business cycle, from $13 trillion today to $200 trillion by 2030, according to Ark Invest's Big Ideas 2023 research.

entries.title: 14 innovation trends with exponential growth potential: Ark's Big Ideas 2023
entries.description: The market value of five disruptive innovation platforms could scale 40% at an annual rate, from $13 trillion today to $200 trillion by 2030.

entries.title: Tech and sustainability: How companies are getting started
entries.description: Sustainability can seem like a very distant goal. But there are ways to make it more achievable.

entries.title: How to find and remove spyware from your phone
entries.description: Surveillance software is becoming more advanced. Here's what to do if you think you're being tracked.

entries.title: OnePlus 11 review: You win some, you lose some (features)
entries.description: The OnePlus 11 wins with a timeless design, fast performance and charging, and an affordable price tag, but loses some of its most loved features.

entries.title: OnePlus Buds Pro 2 review: Buy these for the bassy sound, not the connectivity
entries.description: OnePlus' newest earbuds feature a polished feel and finish and Google's own Spatial Audio. But at $179, they'll need a little more to impress most users.

entries.title: Google expands virtual cards to American Express customers
entries.description: On Safer Internet Day, Google is also giving users more options to use biometrics for privacy

entries.title: Google's Bard builds on controversial LaMDA bot that engineer called 'sentient'
entries.description: Before there was ChatGPT, LaMDA was for several months the world's most controversial AI chatbot.

entries.title: How to watch the Super Bowl 2023: Your best streaming bets
entries.description: The best way for most of us to watch the big game will be in 4K via a streaming service.

entries.title: VMware warns of ransomware attacks on unpatched ESXi hypervisors
entries.description: VMware and cybersecurity authorities warn enterprises to update ESXi hypervisors to supported versions amid widespread ransomware attacks.

entries.title: PC sales are down, but tablets are holding up - here's why
entries.description: Economic uncertainty took a toll on the tablet and PC markets. Despite that, the tablet market in Q4 2022 continued to grow while PCs suffered heavy declines.

entries.title: This notorious ransomware has now found a new target
entries.description: The authors of Clop ransomware are experimenting with a Linux variant - a warning that multiple different platforms are in the sights of cyber extortionists.

entries.title: The ASUS Chromebook C425 just dropped to less than $200 on Amazon
entries.description: You can save 33% off the typical RRP on a thin, light Chromebook ahead of Valentine's Day.

entries.title: Microsoft Outlook outage: Here's what we know so far
entries.description: For the second time in two weeks, Outlook users might not be able to send or receive email.

entries.title: How green are your collaboration tools? Cisco is giving answers
entries.description: Cisco is rolling out a new tool to track the emissions produced by its Webex devices.

entries.title: The 5 best 75-inch TVs of 2023
entries.description: Often the first foray into big-screen TVs, 75-inch TVs are the right size for most home theaters and living rooms but push the boundaries for others. Get ready for the big game with our picks.
